description: It's not the prettiest app, and some of the fancier fucntions are rather wonky, but it connected to my Hue Bridge first try, changed my light's color and brightness, and can turn the light on and off, which are the only functions I honestly need. And all on the Steam Deck.

It works perfectly fine. The app is also nicely done. In Setup, in the Philips HUE section, in the "click here to finish" section, you have to click on the TEXT, this was not clear to me at first. In summary, perfect!
